title: I Will Support You!
detail_text: <:th_ch0106/>Oh...... I bought too many clothes......<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>The prices are low at the second-hand store, so it’s easy to buy too many.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>I ended up buying three coats.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>Well, you bought them because you liked them, right, Yoshiko-chan? Though I didn’t take the weight of all of this into consideration.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>It’s Yohane, not Yoshiko. Ahh, the paper bag is about to break...... Ahhhh! It broke!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>What!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>How unlucky......<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>I brought an extra tote bag. Here, use it.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>Huh? Really?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>Of course. I’m Little Demon Lili. I’ll always help Yoshiko-chan.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
